channel.title: How do I check how many players my server can hold?
channel.description: How can I check how many players I can hold on my PI source.

item.title: How do I check how many players my server can hold?
item.dc:creator: @Your_Master Your Master
item.description:
@Your_Master wrote:

It depends how stable your base is and how strong your Dedicated Server is. Hyperion and PI is good and stable bases to start off a RSPS that can hold many players.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I check how many players my server can hold?

item.title: How do I check how many players my server can hold?
item.dc:creator: @Zanzibar Zanzibar
item.description:
@Zanzibar wrote:

It doesn’t MAJORLY depend on how ‘good’ your computer is, but rather how well the src was coded. If it’s structures and stuff are messed up or there’s a lot of bugs or too much unnecessary stuff, of course it wouldn’t hold that many people without crashing. There’s a ton of variables that are taken into effect too find how many players can be on your server at the same time without crashing. If you meant how much your server could ALLOW then Loveandpower got it.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I check how many players my server can hold?

item.title: How do I check how many players my server can hold?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“hawkgames, post:1, topic:392074”]How can I check how many players I can hold on my PI source.[/quote]This also depends on your base.

I think somewhere in config.java or server.java it states the max amount who can connect. (server side for PI)

edit: just checked in a PI

go to config.java

public static final int MAX_PLAYERS = 1024; That is the MAX, but I doubt you can hold that many without extreme lag.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I check how many players my server can hold?

item.title: How do I check how many players my server can hold?
item.dc:creator: @chazion chazion
item.description:
@chazion wrote:

This is based on how ‘good’ your computer is or your VPS/DEDI. You’ll have to find out for yourself, i recommend using blitz-bot or something to see how many you can hold…sorry for the shit answer
